title: Thunderbolt Monitor problem
message: I hope it's ok to ask this here but got in my first thunderbolt monitor A1407 It charges a laptop just fine but nothing comes on the screen. I went to the screen with a high powered light and no picture either. I tried a seperate thunderbolt cable to the port on the back and still nothing. Also hooked it up to 2 machines. Not sure what to start checking on this one.

title: Thunderbolt Monitor problem
message:
No schematic available for such thing.
You can check at least if get voltage on the regulated power supplies on its board.
Cinema displays had a classic issue with one 3V3 power regulator, but is dificil to troubleshoot these boards.
You should work on it with source machine and LCD both connected.

title: Thunderbolt Monitor problem
message: Was thinking I would check this out like it was a TV (what I used to repair) and sure enough used a TV LED tester and several were out. Took screen apart and 2 strips in there and 1 connector had fallen off but tested all and found 6 out also. Thinking I need to get those fixed first as some TVs will shut right down if not a proper current draw. Found used ones on Aliexpress so need to put this on back burner for a month and wait for them to get here.
